sourcesContent:
Sign Up

Enter details to create your account

Username face @if (authForm.get('username')?.hasError('required')) { Username is required }
Email mail @if (authForm.get('email')?.hasError('required') || authForm.get('email')?.touched) { Please enter a valid email address }
Password {{hide ? 'visibility_off' : 'visibility'}} @if (authForm.get('password')?.hasError('required')) { Password is required }
Confirm Password {{chide ? 'visibility_off' : 'visibility'}} @if (authForm.get('cpassword')?.hasError('required')) { Confirm Password is required }
Already Registered? Login
OR
